title: Fruit in Spiced White Wine
directions: Combine 4 ingredients in heavy medium saucepan. Scrape in seeds from vanilla bean; add bean. Bring to boil. Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer 30 minutes to blend flavors.
Combine apricots and cherries in large bowl. Pour hot wine mixture over. Cool to room temperature. Cover and chill. (Can be made 1 day ahead. Keep chilled.) Serve fruit with liquid.
